thread.title: Larry Fisher
thread.title_full: Antique Lamp Supply reviewed by Larry Fisher

author: Larry Fisher
title: Larry Fisher
text: I was looking for a very rare part for a brass antique torchier pole lamp. They were unfamilier with that part (an in-line mounted 3-way "twist" type rotary tumbler switch) but recommended an aftermarket electronic "touch" type switch that can be installed inside the base so I can maintain the look of the lamp and still make it fully functional.
